website_summaries.verdict: Our pick for those who seek a higher-end jukebox for a man cave, rec room, or home bar.
pros: Can be expanded with external speakers
Remote controls for both music and lights
Bluetooth compatible, with an impressive light display and good internal speakers
cons: Bluetooth adaptor is not built-in, and can work sporadically

customer_reviews.title: Awesome jukebox!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing jukebox! The lights are awesome! The sound is awesome! The bluetooth function works awesome! Everything about this jukebox is awesome and looks awesome in my new home bar! LOVE IT! Definitely order the base stand that comes optional!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Wainio

customer_reviews.title: Gets a lot of attension.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly smaller than I thought it would be. Light remote control is difficult to figure out. Push a lot of buttons and nothing seems to change. Still to figure it out. Bluetooth easy to connect to. Volume and bass is satisfactory. It does have external inputs Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry R

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Overall satisfied with this product. Would be even better if you could control your device's music from the jukebox itself (thus, like a real Jukebox). Love the fact that I can connect external speakers to complement the internal ones. Very retro look. Neat remote controls; one for music, one for lights. Can operate lights and music independently. Some aspects of it could be modernized, but neat overall.
customer_reviews.author: A.E.Amador

customer_reviews.title: Stops working in less than a year.
customer_reviews.text: Initially worked well, but in less than a year, it completely shut down except for the lights. And good luck getting any customer support; it is non existent. When I tried to contact, was redirected to a repair company that tried to get me to sign a contract on a variety of products without even addressing my problem for this overpriced colored light bulb. A total waste of money with no help.
customer_reviews.author: Robert D. Gunning

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but lighting effects could be better
customer_reviews.text: I'm a little disappointed that the lights around the unit are a static single color and do not move or cycle. For features available the device is on the pricey side, I would expect it to do more. Also, given the price tag I would expect less plastic and more metal/wood. Overall I am satisfied, it does what it's suppose to, has a great sound, and has an okay build quality. Time will tell how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Morante

customer_reviews.title: Ordered this product twice and both times product was defective ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product twice and both times product was defective. CD player did not work. Kept turning off and on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Contact support has been no help.
customer_reviews.text: I lo e the jukebox but am having a problem with the cd player. The support team has not called me back and I am having to go to the crosely website to get help.
customer_reviews.author: carol lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This is absolutely fantastic! You can connect your Amazon Alexa to have the best sound imiaginsble!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dane

customer_reviews.title: This is not full size
customer_reviews.text: Item was returned for a full refund. This is not full sized as advertised, but a table top, as labeled on the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: juke box keeps turning off.
customer_reviews.text: This device doesn't stay on. Keeps turning off and on.
customer_reviews.author: sylmando

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged.
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived totally shredded and beat up. I think it was damaged because there is a strip of color at the bottom of the u that contrasts with the rest of the LED.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the jukebox and it makes me smile every day
customer_reviews.text: I love the jukebox and it makes me smile every day. We listen to the radio, or CD's or anything else and so enjoy. And, I love the flashing lights.
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA S LORINCZ

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The audio is awesome-The remote is too small, but otherwise I'd still buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ronnie Smithers

customer_reviews.title: Is this product, worth it?
customer_reviews.text: i love this jukebox it's not to loud, it has good bass, i love that it's bluetooth, and i jut love it!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dunn

product_meta.title: Crosley Full Size iJuke Bluetooth Jukebox with CD, AM/FM Radio and Color Changing LED Lights, Walnut
product_meta.description: With the Crosley CR1206A-WA, keep the beauty of colorful jukeboxes without sacrificing any technological advances. This Bluetooth-enabled jukebox can connect with modern devices, tune into the radio, or even play CDs. Nostalgia and convenience mix with tradition in this beautiful bubbling hardwood cabinet finished with hand-rubbed veneers, making this entertainment center a perfect blend of the past and present.
feature_bullets: Enjoy all your favorite music in style with the iJuke Bluetooth jukebox featuring front-loading CD player and built-in AM/FM radio
Color shifting LED lighting and a decorative musical playlist
High quality hardwood cabinet with hand-rubbed paprika finish and woven grill cloth
Ultra-compact remote controls for music and lighting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars31 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
